title: Looking for Young glove Sweet Cap or Polar Bear; Tinker, Chase EPDG to trade
author: David R

posts.post_title: Looking for Young glove Sweet Cap or Polar Bear; Tinker, Chase EPDG to trade
posts.post_content:
[QUOTE][/QUOTE]Looking for a Young glove, Sweet Cap 350-460, fac 25 back or a Polar Bear back. Ideally PSA/SGC 2-4.  

I can buy or have the Tinker EPDG, Marquard and Matty below to trade. Also have a nice Chase pink EPDG SGC 40 to trade. 

Thanks
I also have an SGC 30 Hindu Willis portrait I could trade.
Added some pictures of some of the cards I have available for trade (or possible sale)
Still looking for the Young glove.

[quote name="David R" post=1178576]Still looking for the Young glove.[/QUOTE]


Hi David

I have this card with a POLAR BEAR back for sale......it is graded SGC 30.

TED Z
Moved the Tinker EPDG to eBay.  Still looking for the Young.
